== Description ==

Add Social Media Share from your sidebar.
Includes 30 different icons to choose from.  The default icon set features all the icon types found in the other icon sets.

== Installation ==

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.


= How to use the widget =

In the Widgets admin page  drag the "Social Media Share" to the sidebar. Expand the settings and choose a theme (Default is initially selected). Drag - Drop the icons you would like to. Click each icon to enter the corresponding URL or setting. Check - uncheck the plural form - new window options.  When you done with the configure of the widget, save the widget settings.

= Can i add my own icons to the widget? =

Yes.Disable the plugin. Using an FTP client, navigate to the "iconset: folder under the wp-content/plugins/smh_widget/images in your wordpress installation.  Now Create a new folder for your custom iconset, naming it accordingly.  Add your icons (.png format, preferably 32px x 32px size). The activate the plugin.  The new iconset will be appear in the themes selection in the widget settings.

= Can the icon order be changed? =

Yes. In the widget settings, drag the icons into the desired order and save.  They will appear in that order on your blog.
